attributes.action: allow the British people to create E-Petitions asking for a Vote of No-Confidence.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Several UK citizens have asked for a Vote of No-Confidence in the current Government via E-Petition, for reasons including the lack of referendum on the EU Constitution, which the Government promised. These E-Petitions have all been rejected, and I ask that petitions such as these be allowed. I also ask that the opposition call a Vote of No-Confidence in this Government.

rejection.details:
A vote of no confidence by popular vote is a general election by proxy, and therefore overlaps with http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/springelection/.
Your request to the opposition should be put to them directly.
reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
